src_original: CANTO VIII
tgt_original: aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ  strī-vighna

src_original: atha nandam adhīralocanaṃ gṛhayānotsukam utsukotuskam /  abhigamya śivena cakṣuṣā śramaṇaḥ kaś cid uvāca maitrayā // Saund_8.1 //
tgt_original: atha nandamadhīralocanaṃ gṛhayānotsukamutsukotsukam |  abhigamya śivena cakṣuṣā śramaṇaḥ kaściduvāca maitrayā ||1 ||

src_original: kim idaṃ mukham aśrudurinaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ vivṛṇoti te tamaḥ /
tgt_original: kimidaṃ mukhamaśrudurdinaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ vivṛṇoti te tamaḥ |

src_original: dhṛtim ehi niyaccha vikriyāṃ na hi bāṣpaś ca śamaś ca śobhate // Saund_8.2 //
tgt_original: dhṛtimehi niyaccha vikriyāṃ na hi bāṣpaśca śamaśca śobhate ||2 ||

src_original: dvividhā samudeti vedanā niyataṃ cetasi deha eva ca /
tgt_original: dvividhā samudeti vedanā niyataṃ cetasi deha eva ca |

src_original: śrutavidhyupacārakovidā dvividhā eva tayoś cikitsakāḥ // Saund_8.3 //
tgt_original: śrutavidhyupacārakovidā dvividhā eva tayościkitsakāḥ ||3 ||

src_original: tad iyaṃ yadi kāyikī rujā bhiṣaje tūrṇam anūnam ucyatām /
tgt_original: tadiyaṃ yadi kāyikī rujā bhiṣaje tūrṇamanūnamucyatām |

src_original: viniguhya hi rogam āturo nacirāt tīvram anartham ṛcchati // Saund_8.4 //
tgt_original: viniguhya hi rogamāturo nacirāttīvramanarthamṛcchati ||4 ||

src_original: atha duḥkham idaṃ manomayaṃ vada vakṣyāmi yad atra bheṣajam /
tgt_original: atha duḥkhamidaṃ manomayaṃ vada vakṣyāmi yadatra bheṣajam |

src_original: manaso hi rajastamasvino bhiṣajo 'dhyātmavidaḥ parīkṣakāḥ // Saund_8.5 //
tgt_original: manaso hi rajastamasvino bhiṣajo'dhyātmavidaḥ parīkṣakāḥ ||5 ||

src_original: nikhilena ca satyam ucyatāṃ yadi vācyaṃ mayi saumya manyaste /
tgt_original: nikhilena ca satyamucyatāṃ yadi vācyaṃ mayi saumya manyase |

src_original: gatayo vividhā hi cetasāṃ bahuguhyāni madākulāni ca // Saund_8.6 //
tgt_original: gatayo vividhā hi cetasāṃ bahuguhyāni mahākulāni ca ||6 ||

src_original: iti tena sa coditas tadā vyavasāyaṃ pravivakṣur ātmanaḥ /  avalambya kare kareṇa taṃ pravivakṣur ātmanaḥ // Saund_8.7 //
tgt_original: iti tena sa coditastadā vyavasāyaṃ pravivakṣurātmanaḥ |  avalambya kare kareṇa taṃ praviveśānyatarad vanāntaram ||7 ||

src_original: atha tatra śucau latāgṛhe kusumodgāriṇi tau niṣedatuḥ /
tgt_original: atha tatra śucau latāgṛhe kusumodgāriṇi tau niṣedatuḥ |

src_original: mṛdubhir mṛdumāruteritair upagūdhāv iva bālapallavaiḥ // Saund_8.8 //
tgt_original: mṛdubhirmṛdumāruteritairupagūḍhāviva bālapallavaiḥ ||8 ||

src_original: sa jagāda tataś cikīṣitam ghananiśvāsagṛhītam antarā /
tgt_original: sa jagāda tataścikīrṣitaṃ ghananiśvāsagṛhītamantarā |

src_original: śrutavāgviśadāya bhikṣave viduṣā pravrajitena durvacam // Saund_8.9 //
tgt_original: śrutavāgviśadāya bhikṣave viduṣā pravrajitena durvacam ||9 ||

src_original: sadṛśaṃ yadi dharmacāriṇaḥ satataṃ prāṇiṣu maitracetasaḥ /  adhṛtau yad iyaṃ hitaiṣitā mayi te syāt karuṇātmanaḥ sataḥ // Saund_8.10 //
tgt_original: sadṛśaṃ yadi dharmacāriṇaḥ satataṃ prāṇiṣu maitracetasaḥ |  adhṛtau yadiyaṃ hitaiṣitā mayi te syāt karuṇātmanaḥ sataḥ ||10 ||

src_original: ata eva ca me viśeṣataḥ pravivakṣā kṣamavādini tvayi /
tgt_original: ata eva ca me viśeṣataḥ pravivakṣā kṣamavādini tvayi |

src_original: na hi bhāvam imaṃ calātmane kathayeyaṃ bruvate 'py asādhave // Saund_8.11 //
tgt_original: na hi bhāvamimaṃ calātmane kathayeyaṃ bruvate'pyasādhave ||11 ||

src_original: tad idaṃ śṛṇu me samāsato na rame dharavidhāv ṛte priyām /
tgt_original: tadidaṃ śrṛṇu me samāsato na rame dharmavidhāvṛte priyām |

src_original: girisānuṣu kāminīm ṛte kṛtaretā iva kiṃnaraś caran // Saund_8.12 //
tgt_original: girisānuṣu kāminīmṛte kṛtaretā iva kinnaraścaran ||12 ||

src_original: vanavāsasukhāt parāṅmukhaḥ prayiyāsā gṛham eva yena me /
tgt_original: vanavāsasukhāt parāṅmukhaḥ prayiyāsā gṛhameva yena me |

src_original: na hi śarma labhe tayā vinā nṛpatir hīna ivottamaśriyā // Saund_8.13 //
tgt_original: na hi śarma labhe tayā binā nṛpatirhīna ivottamaśriyā ||13 ||

src_original: atha tasya niśamya tadvacaḥ priyabhāryābhimukhasya śocataḥ /
tgt_original: atha tasya niśamya tadvacaḥ priyabhāryābhimukhasya śocataḥ |  śramaṇaḥ sa śiraḥ prakampayannijagādātmagataṃ śanairidam ||14 ||

src_original: kṛpaṇaṃ bata yūthalālaso mahato vyādhabhayād viniḥsṛtaḥ /  pravivikṣati vāgurāṃ mṛgaś capalo gītaraveṇa vañcitaḥ // Saund_8.15 //  vihagaḥ khalu jālasaṃvṛto hitakāmena janena mokṣitaḥ /
tgt_original: kṛpaṇaṃ bata yūthalālaso mahato vyādhabhayād viniḥsṛtaḥ |  pravivikṣati vāgurāṃ mṛgaścapalo gītaraveṇa vañcitaḥ ||15 ||  vihagaḥ khalu jālasaṃvṛto hitakāmena janena mokṣitaḥ |

src_original: vicaran phalapuṣpavadvanaṃ pravivikṣuḥ svayam eva pañjaram // Saund_8.16 //
tgt_original: vicaran phalapuṣpavadvanaṃ pravivikṣuḥ svayameva pañcaram ||16 ||

src_original: kalabhaḥ kariṇā khalūddhṛto bahupaṅkād viṣamān nadītalāt /  jalatarṣavaśena tāṃ punaḥ saritaṃ grāhavatī titīrṣati // Saund_8.17 //
tgt_original: kalabhaḥ kariṇā khalūddhṛtoḥ bahupaṅkād viṣamānnadītalāt |  jalatarṣavaśena tāṃ punaḥ saritaṃ grāhavatīṃ titīrṣati ||17 ||

src_original: śaraṇe sabhujaṅgame svapan pratibuddhena pareña bodhitaḥ /
tgt_original: śaraṇe sabhujaṅgame svapan pratibuddhena pareṇa bodhitaḥ |

src_original: taruṇaḥ khalu jātavibhramaḥ svayam ugraṃ bhujagaṃ jighṛkṣati // Saund_8.18 //  mahatā khalu jātavedasā jvalitād utpatito vanadrumāt /
tgt_original: taruṇaḥ khalu jātavibhramaḥ svayamugraṃ bhujagaṃ jighṛkṣati ||18 ||  mahatā khalu jātavedasā jvalitādutpatito vanadrumāt |

src_original: punar icchati nīḍatṛṣṇayā patituṃ tatra gatavyatho dvijaḥ // Saund_8.19 //
tgt_original: punaricchati nīḍatṛṣṇayā patituṃ tatra gatavyatho dvijaḥ ||19 ||

src_original: avaśaḥ khalu kāmamūrchayā priyayā śyenabhayād vinākṛtaḥ /
tgt_original: avaśaḥ khalu kāmamūrcchayā priyayā śyenabhayād vinākṛtaḥ |

src_original: na dhṛtiṃ samupaiti na hriyaṃ karuṇaṃ jīvati jīvajīvakaḥ // Saund_8.20 //
tgt_original: na dhṛtiṃ samupaiti na hriyaṃ karuṇaṃ jīvati jīvajīvakaḥ ||20 ||

src_original: akṛtātmatayā tṛṣānvito ghṛṇayā caiva dhiyā ca varjitaḥ /
tgt_original: akṛtātmatayā tṛṣānvito ghṛṇayā caiva dhiyā ca varjitaḥ |

src_original: aśanaṃ khalu vāntam ātmanā kṛpañaḥ śvā punar attum icchati // Saund_8.21 //
tgt_original: aśanaṃ khalu vāntamātmanā kṛpaṇaḥ śvā punarattumicchati ||21 ||

src_original: iti manmathaśokakarṣitaṃ tam anudhyāya muhur nirīkṣya ca /  śramaṇaḥ sa hitābhikāṅkṣayā guṇavadvākyam uvāca vipriyam // Saund_8.22 //
tgt_original: iti manmathaśokakarṣitaṃ tamanudhyāya muhurnirīkṣya ca |  śramaṇaḥ sa hitābhikāṅkṣayā guṇavad vākyamuvāca vipriyam ||22 ||

src_original: avicārayataḥ śubhāśubhaṃ viṣayeṣv eva niviṣṭacetasaḥ /  upapannam alabdhacakusuṣo na ratiḥ śreyasi ced bhavet tava // Saund_8.23 //
tgt_original: avicārayataḥ śubhāśubhaṃ viṣayeṣveva niviṣṭacetasaḥ |  upapannamalabdhacakṣuṣo na ratiḥ śreyasi ced bhavettava ||23 ||

src_original: śravaṇe grahaṇe 'tha dhāraṇe paramārthāvagame manaḥśame /  aviṣaktamateś calātmano na hi dharme 'bhiratir vidhīyate // Saund_8.24 //
tgt_original: śravaṇe grahaṇe'tha dhāraṇe paramārthāvagame manaḥśame |  aviṣaktamateścalātmano na hi dharme'bhiratirvidhīyate ||24 ||

src_original: viṣayeṣu tu doṣadarśinaḥ parituṣṭasya śucer amāninaḥ /
tgt_original: viṣayeṣu tu doṣadarśinaḥ parituṣṭasya śuceramāninaḥ |

src_original: ramate tṛṣito dhanaśriyā ramate kāmasukhen bāliśaḥ /
tgt_original: ramate tṛṣito dhanaśriyā ramate kāmasukhena bāliśaḥ |

src_original: ramate praśamena sajjanaḥ paribhogān paribhūya vidyayā // Saund_8.26 //
tgt_original: ramate praśamena sajjanaḥ paribhogān paribhūya vidyayā ||26 ||

src_original: api ca prathitasya dhīmataḥ kulajasyārcitaliṅgadhāriṇaḥ /  sadṛśī na gṛhāya cetanā praṇatir vāyuvaśād girer iva // Saund_8.27 //
tgt_original: api ca prathitasya dhīmataḥ kulajasyārcitaliṅgadhāriṇaḥ |  sadṛśī na gṛhāya cetanā praṇatirvāyuvaśad gireriva ||27 ||

src_original: spṛhyet parasaṃśritāya yaḥ paribhūyātmavaśāṃ svatantratām /
tgt_original: spṛhayet parasaṃśritāya yaḥ paribhūyātmavaśāṃ svatantratām |

src_original: upaśāntipathe śive sthitaḥ spṛhayed doṣavate gṛhāya saḥ // Saund_8.28 //
tgt_original: upaśāntipathe śive sthitaḥ spṛhayeddoṣavate gṛhāya saḥ ||28 ||

src_original: vyasanābhihato yathā viśet parmuktaḥ punar eva bandhanam /
tgt_original: vyasanābhihato yathā viśet parimuktaḥ punareva bandhanam |

src_original: samupetya vanaṃ tathā punar gṛhasaṃjñaṃ mṛgayeta bandhanam // Saund_8.29 //
tgt_original: samupetya vanaṃ tathā punargṛhasaṃjñaṃ mṛgayeta bandhanam ||29 ||

src_original: puruṣaś ca vihāya yaḥ kaliṃ punar icchet kalim eva sevitum /
tgt_original: puruṣaśca vihāya yaḥ kaliṃ punaricchet kalimeva sevitum |

src_original: sa vihāya bhajeta bāliṣaḥ kalibhūtām ajitendriyaḥ priyām // Saund_8.30 //
tgt_original: sa vihāya bhajeta bāliśaḥ kalibhūtāmajitendriyaḥ priyām ||30 ||

src_original: saviṣā iva saṃśritā latāḥ parimṛṣṭā iva soragā guhāḥ /
tgt_original: saviṣā iva saṃśritā latāḥ parimṛṣṭā iva soragā guhāḥ |

src_original: vivṛtā iva cāsayo dhṛtā vyasanāntā hi bhavanti yoṣitaḥ // Saund_8.31 //
tgt_original: vivṛtā iva cāsayo dhṛtā vyasanāntā hi bhavanti yoṣitaḥ ||31 ||

src_original: pramadāḥ samadā madapradāḥ pramadā vītamadā bhayapradāḥ /
tgt_original: pramadāḥ samadā madapradāḥ pramadā vitamadā bhayapradāḥ |

src_original: iti doṣabhayāvahāś ca tāḥ katham arhanti niṣevanaṃ nu tāḥ // Saund_8.32 //
tgt_original: iti doṣabhayāvahāśca tāḥ kathamarhanti niṣevaṇaṃ nu tāḥ ||32 ||

src_original: svajanaḥ svajanena bhidyate suhṛdaś cāpi suhṛjjanena yat /
tgt_original: svajanaḥ svajanena bhidyate suhadaścāpi suhṛjjanena yat |

src_original: paradoṣavikṣaṇāḥ śaṭhās tadanāryāḥ pracaranti yoṣitaḥ // Saund_8.33 //  kulajāḥ kṛpaṇībhavanti yad yad ayuktaṃ pracaranti sāhasam /  praviśanti ca yac camūmukhaṃ rabhasās tatra nimittam aṅganāḥ // Saund_8.34 //
tgt_original: paradoṣavicakṣaṇāḥ śaṭhāstadanāryāḥ pracaranti yoṣitaḥ ||33 ||  kulajāḥ kṛpaṇībhavanti yadyadayuktaṃ pracaranti sāhasam |  praviśanti ca yaccamūmukhaṃ rabhasāstatra nimittamaṅganāḥ ||34 ||

src_original: vacanena haranati valgunā niśitena praharanti cetasā /  madhu tiṣṭhati vāci yoṣitāṃ hṛdaye hālahalaṃ mahadviṣam // Saund_8.35 //
tgt_original: vacanena haranti valgunā niśitena praharanti cetasā |  madhu tiṣṭhati vāci yoṣitāṃ hṛdaye hālahalaṃ mahadviṣaśam ||35 ||

src_original: pradahan dahano 'pi gṛhyate viśarīraḥ pavano 'pi gṛhyate /
tgt_original: pradahan dahano'pi gṛhyate viśarīraḥ pavano'pi gṛhyate |

src_original: kupito bhujago 'pi gṛhyate pradānāṃ tu mano na gṛhyate // Saund_8.36 //
tgt_original: kupito bhujago'pi gṛhyate pramadānāṃ tu mano na gṛhyate ||36 ||

src_original: na vapur vimṛśanti na śriyaṃ na matiṃ nāpi kulaṃ na vikramam /
tgt_original: na vapurvimṛśanti na śriyaṃ na matiṃ nāpi kulaṃ na vikramam |

src_original: praharanty aviśeṣataḥ striyaḥ sarito grāhakulākulā iva // Saund_8.37 //
tgt_original: praharantyaviśeṣataḥ striyaḥ sarito grāhakulākulā iva ||37 ||

src_original: na vaco madhuraṃ na lālanaṃ smarati strī na ca suahṛdaṃ kva cit /
tgt_original: na vaco madhuraṃ na lālanaṃ smarati strī na ca sauhṛdaṃ kvacit |

src_original: kalitā vanitaiva cañcalā tad ihāriṣv iva nāvalambyate // Saund_8.38 //
tgt_original: kalitā vanitaiva cañcalā tadihāriṣviva nāvalambyate ||38 ||

src_original: adadatsu bhavanti narmadāḥ pradadatsu praviśanti vibhramam /  praṇateṣu bhavanti garvitāḥ pramadās tṛptatarāś ca māniṣu // Saund_8.39 //
tgt_original: adadatsu bhavanti narmadāḥ pradadatsu praviśanti vibhramam |  praṇateṣu bhavanti garvitāḥ pramadāstṛptatarāśca māniṣu ||39 ||

src_original: guṇavatsu caranti bhartṛvad guṇahīneṣu caranti putravat /
tgt_original: guṇavatsu caranti bhartṛvad guṇahīneṣu caranti putravat |

src_original: dhanavatsu caranti tṛṣṇayā dhanahīneṣu caranty avajñayā // Saund_8.40 //
tgt_original: dhanavatsu caranti tṛṣṇayā dhanahīneṣu carantyavajñayā ||40 ||

src_original: viṣayād viṣayāntaraṃ gatā pracaraty eva yathā hṛtāpi gauḥ /
tgt_original: viṣayād viṣayāntaraṃ gatā pracaratyeva yathā hṛtāpi gau |  anavekṣitapūrvasauhṛdā ramate'nyatra gatā tathāṅganā ||41 ||

src_original: praviśanty api hi striyaś citām anubhadhnanty api muktajīvtāḥ /
tgt_original: praviśantyapi hi striyaścitāmanubadhnantyapi muktajīvitāḥ |

src_original: api bibhrati naiva yantraṇā na tu bhāvena vahanti sāhṛdam // Saund_8.42 //
tgt_original: api bibhrati caiva yantraṇā na tu bhāvena vahanti sauhṛdam ||42 ||

src_original: ramayanti patīn kathaṃ cana pramadā yāḥ patidevatāḥ kva cit /
tgt_original: ramayanti patīn kathañcana pramadā yāḥ patidevatāḥ kvacit |

src_original: calacittatayā sahasraśo ramayante hṛdayaṃ svan eva tāḥ // Saund_8.43 //
tgt_original: calacittatayā sahastraśo ramayante hṛdayaṃ svameva tāḥ ||43 ||

src_original: śvapacaṃ kila senajitsutā cakame mīnaripuṃ kumudvatī /
tgt_original: śvapacaṃ kila senajitsutā cakame mīnaripuṃ kumudvatī |

src_original: mṛgarājam atho bṛhadrathā pramadānām agatir na vidyate // Saund_8.44 //
tgt_original: mṛgarājamatho bṛhadrathā pramadānāmagatirna vidyate ||44 ||

src_original: kuruhaihayavṛṣṇivaṃśajā bahumāyākavaco 'tha śambaraḥ /
tgt_original: kuruhaihayavṛṣṇivaṃśajā bahumāyākavaco'tha śambaraḥ |

src_original: munir ugratapāś ca gautamaḥ samavāpur vanitoddhataṃ rajaḥ // Saund_8.45 //
tgt_original: munirugratapāśca gautamaḥ samavāpurvanitoddhataṃ rajaḥ ||45 ||

src_original: akṛtajñam anāryam asthiraṃ vanitānām ida īdṛśaṃ manaḥ /
tgt_original: akṛtajñamanāryamasthiraṃ vanitānāmidamīdṛśaṃ manaḥ |

src_original: katham arhati tāsu paṇḍito hṛdayaṃ sañjayituṃ calātmasu // Saund_8.46 //
tgt_original: kathamarhati tāsu paṇḍito hṛdayaṃ sañjayituṃ calātmasu ||46 ||

src_original: atha sūkṣmamati dvayāśivaṃ laghu tāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ na paśyasi /
tgt_original: atha sūkṣmamatidvayāśivaṃ laghu tāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ na paśyasi |

src_original: kimu kāyam asadgṛhaṃ sravad vaintānām aśuciṃ na paśyasi // Saund_8.47 //
tgt_original: kimu kāyamasadgṛhaṃ sravad vanitānāmaśuciṃ na paśyasi ||47 ||

src_original: anulepanam añjanaṃ srajo maṇimuktātapanīyam aṃśukam /  yad ahany ahani pradhāvanair vasanaiś cābharaṇaiś ca saṃskṛtam /
tgt_original: yadahanyahani pradhāvanairvasanaiścābharaṇaiśca saṃskṛtam |

src_original: aśubhaṃ tamasāvṛtekṣaṇaḥ śubhato gacchasi nāvagacchasi // Saund_8.48 //
tgt_original: aśubhaṃ tamasāvṛtekṣaṇaḥ śubhato gacchasi nāvagacchasi ||48 ||

src_original: atha vā samavaiṣi tattanūm aśubhāṃ tvaṃ na tu saṃvid asti te /
tgt_original: athavā samavaiṣi tattanūmaśubhāṃ tvaṃ na tu saṃvidasti te |

src_original: surabhiṃ vidadhāsi hi kriyām aśuces tatprabhavasya śāntaye // Saund_8.49 //
tgt_original: surabhiṃ vidadhāsi hi kriyāmaśucestatprabhavasya śāntaye ||49 ||

src_original: yadi sādhu kim atra yoṣitāṃ sahajaṃ tāsu vicīyatāṃ śuci // Saund_8.50 //
tgt_original: yadi sādhu kimatra yoṣitāṃ sahajaṃ tāsu vicīyatāṃ śuci ||50 ||

src_original: malapaṅkadharā digambarā prakṛtisthair nakhadantaromabhiḥ /
tgt_original: malapaṅkadharā digambarā prakṛtisthairnakhadantaromabhiḥ |

src_original: yadi sā tava sundarī bhaven niyataṃ te 'dya na sundarī bhavet // Saund_8.51 //
tgt_original: yadi sā tava sundarī bhavenniyataṃ te'dya na sundarī bhavet ||51 ||

src_original: sravatīm aśuciṃ spṛśec ca kaḥ saghuṇo jarjarabhāṇḍavat striyam /
tgt_original: stravatīmaśuciṃ spṛśecca kaḥ saghṛṇo jarjarabhāṇḍavat striyam |

src_original: yadi kevalayā tvacāvṛtā na bhaven makṣikapattramātrayā // Saund_8.52 //
tgt_original: yadi kevalayā tvacāvṛtā na bhavenmakṣikapatramātrayā ||52 ||

src_original: tvacaveṣṭhitam astipañjaraṃ yadi kāyaṃ samavaiṣi yoṣitām /
tgt_original: tvacaveṣṭitamasthipañjaraṃ yadi kāyaṃ samavaiṣi yoṣitām |

src_original: madanena ca kṛṣyase balād aghṛṇaḥ kāyaṃ samvaiṣi yoṣitām // Saund_8.53 //
tgt_original: madanena ca kṛṣyase balādaghṛṇaḥ khalvadhṛtiśca manmathaḥ ||53 ||

src_original: śubhatām aśubheṣu kalpayan nakhadantatvacakeśaromasu /
tgt_original: śubhatāmaśubheṣu kalpayan nakhadantatvacakeśaromasu |

src_original: avicakṣaṇa kiṃ na paśyasi prakṛtiṃ ca prabhavaṃ ca yoṣitām // Saund_8.54 //
tgt_original: avicakṣaṇa kiṃ na paśyasi prakṛtiṃ ca prabhavaṃ ca yoṣitām ||54 ||

src_original: tad avetya manaḥśarīrayor vanitā doṣavatīr viśeṣataḥ /  capalaṃ bhavanotsukaṃ manaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena vāryatām // Saund_8.55 //
tgt_original: tadavetya manaḥśarirayorvanitā doṣavatīrviśeṣataḥ |  capalaṃ bhavanotsukaṃ manaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena vāryatām ||55 ||

src_original: śrutavān matimān kulodgataḥ paramasya praśamasya bhājanam /
tgt_original: śrutavān matimān kulodgataḥ paramasya praśamasya bhājanam |

src_original: upagamya yathā tathā punar na hi behttuṃ niyamaṃ tvam arhasi // Saund_8.56 //
tgt_original: upagamya yathā tathā punarna hi bhettuṃ niyamaṃ tvamarhasi ||56 ||

src_original: abhijanamahato manasvinaḥ priyayaśaso bahumānam icchataḥ /
tgt_original: abhijanamahato manasvinaḥ priyayaśaso bahumānamicchataḥ |

src_original: nidhanam api varaṃ sthirātmanaś cyutavinayasya na caiva jīvitam // Saund_8.57 //
tgt_original: nidhanamapi varaṃ sthirātmanaścyutavinayasya na caiva jīvitam ||57 ||

src_original: baddhvā yathā hi kavacaṃ pragṛhītacāpo nindyo bhavaty apasṛtaḥ samarād rathasthaḥ /
tgt_original: baddhvā yathā hi kavacaṃ pragṛhītacāpo,  nindyo bhavatyapasṛtaḥ samarād rathasthaḥ |

src_original: bhaikṣākam abhyupagataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ nindyas tathā bhavati kāmarhṛtendriyāśvaḥ // Saund_8.58 //
tgt_original: bhaikṣākamabhyupagataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ,  nindyastathā bhavati kāmahṛtendriyāśvaḥ ||58 ||

src_original: hāsyo yathā ca paramābharaṇāmbarasrag bhaikṣaṃ caran dhṛtadhanuś calacitramauliḥ /  vairūpyam abhyupagataḥ paraiṇḍabhojī hāsyas tathā gṛhasukhābhimukhaḥ satṛṣṇaḥ // Saund_8.59 //
tgt_original: hāsyo yathā ca paramābharaṇāmbarastrag bhaikṣaṃ caran dhṛtadhanuścalacitramauliḥ |  vairūpyamabhyupagataḥ parapiṇḍabhojī hāsyastathā gṛhasukhābhimukhaḥ satṛṣṇaḥ ||59 ||

src_original: yathā svannaṃ bhuktvā paramaśyanīye 'pi śayito varāho nirmuktaḥ punar aśuci dhāvet paricitam /
tgt_original: yathā svannaṃ bhuktvā paramaśayanīye'pi śayito,  varāho nirmuktaḥ punaraśuci dhāvet paricitam |

src_original: tathā śreyaḥ śṛṇvan praśamasukham āsvādya guṇavad vanaṃ śāntaṃ hitvā gṛham abhilaṣet kāmatṛṣitaḥ // Saund_8.60 //
tgt_original: tathā śreyaḥ śrṛṇvan praśamasukhamāsvādya guṇavad,  vanaṃ śāntaṃ hitvā gṛhamabhilaṣet kāmatṛṣitaḥ ||60 ||

src_original: yatholkā hastasthā dahati pavanapreritaśikhā yathā pādākrānto daśati bhujagaḥ krodharabhasaḥ /
tgt_original: yatholkā hastasthā dahati pavanapreritaśikhā yathā pādākrānto daśati bhujagaḥ krodharabhasaḥ |

src_original: yathā hanti vyāghraḥ śiśur api gṛhīto gṛhagataḥ tathā strīsaṃsargo bhuvidham anarthāya bhavati // Saund_8.61 //
tgt_original: yathā hanti vyāghraḥ śiśurapi gṛhīto gṛhagataḥ tathā strīsaṃsargo bahuvidhamanarthāya bhavati ||61 ||

src_original: tad vijñāya manaḥśarīraniyatān nāriṣu doṣān imān matvā kāmasukhaṃ nadījalacalaṃ kleśāya śokāya ca /
tgt_original: tadvijñāya manaḥśarīraniyatānnārīṣu doṣānimān,  matvā kāmasukhaṃ nadījalacalaṃ kleśāya śokāya ca |

src_original: dṛṣṭvā durbalam āmapatrasadṛśaṃ mṛtyūpasṛṣṭaṃ jagan nirmokṣāya kuruṣva buddhim atulām utkaṇṭhituṃ nārhasi // Saund_8.62 //
tgt_original: dṛṣṭvā durbalamāmapātrasadṛśaṃ mṛtyūpasṛṣṭaṃ jagan-  nirmokṣāya kuruṣva buddhimatulāmutkaṇṭhituṃ nārhasi ||62 ||

src_original: Sundaranande mahākāvye strīvighāto nāmāṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ /
tgt_original: saundarananda mahākāvye “strī-vighna“ nāma aṣṭama sarga samāpta |
